input.sentences: our trip viewing historical homes and landmarks was remarkable .
the land was so lush and green it seemed as though it were out of a movie .
the stone and brick work was quite intricate and original .
this is another example of some amazing brickwork we saw .
the flowers around the home and land were just lovely .
output.sentences: We learned a great deal about the locale
